title: How to get a degree - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not sure how to answer this question. Basically, one “gets a degree” by completing the requirements for it through attendance at an accredited institution. And in order to do that, one must apply, register, attend, maintain a passing GPA, and finally graduate. If you’re working at a medium to large sized company, look into tuition reimbursement and company benefits for attending college. If you’re in the military, look into the GI Bill and veterans benefits (or for attending school while serving). The rest of the answer is really up to you. It depends on your area of interest, what your vision is for your career, and where you want to go. I cannot tell you that. Original question: How should I get my degree?

Lift some heavy ass books. Get into college, choose a major, complete the required coursework for your major and meet all graduation requirements, then apply for graduation. Make sure you stay up to date on program requirements for your major.
You take the required classes and units for your major get a 2.0 or higher and voila your an official card carrying graduate and you dress up with cap and gown.
